content: readme.md react eventdeclarative to handle events outside / inside react component.exampleimport enhancewithevent '@pinnacleio/react-event'class helloworld extends component { handleevent() { /* whatever want :) */ } render() { return <div /> }}// component calls `handleevent` method `mousedown` is fired anywhere.const foo = enhancewithevent('mousedown')(helloworld)// component calls `handleevent` method `mousedown` is fired inside .const bar = enhancewithevent('mousedown', { inside: true })(helloworld)// component calls `handleevent` method `mousedown` is fired outside it.const baz = enhancewithevent('mousedown', { outside: true })(helloworld)api component must define method handleevent() order enhancer work, otherwise nothing happen.enhancewithevent( events: string | array<string>, options: object,): higherordercomponentparameterdescriptionexampledefault valueeventsevent type(s) listen .'mousedown', ['mousedown', 'touchstart']niloptionswhere event be accepted.{ outside: true }, { inside: true }{}
